Bjarne Andersen wrote:
> Hi.
>
> The perlscripts in the distro (e.g. make_reports.pl) are no longer 
> working due - I assume to an extra field in the crawl.log header-lines
> The script has not been updated to the new format of e.g hosts-report.txt
I just did a quick check and they seem to be working for me.  Whats the 
complaint you're seeing from Perl Bjarne?
>
> Does anyone maintain these ? - if so it would be nice if they could be 
> updated to reflect the state of the standard heritrix output.
Yeah.  They should be kept up to date (or thrown out).   Want to send a 
patch?

Thanks Bjarne.
St.Ack

>
> best
